scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.build:desktop:assets: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api && cross-env NEXT_OUTPUT_EXPORT=1 npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.build:desktop: npm run build:desktop:assets && npm run dist -w apps/desktop
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w packages/shared && npm run typecheck -w apps/api && npm run typecheck -w apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/api && npm run test -w apps/web
